text: Hi, how to set up a staging website? I already pushed my website to live now I want to make the same on staging also, how can I do that? please help. Thanks!
I'm also looking for an answer to this so please come back and share if you figure this out

Hi <@U0170TSLF5L>

You are looking for Content Staging.  It’s a little bit difficult to find.

Go to “website pages” then on the left side of the screen under “more tools” you will find the link to content staging.
